items.summary: Fix profile creation so that a newly authenticated user (signing in with their own Internet Identity / Google-backed II) can successfully create an initial profile and proceed past the role selection step (police/ambulance) without requiring admin setup.

Update backend authorization rules for basic user onboarding so that authenticated (non-anonymous) callers can read their own profile and create their initial profile, while keeping admin-only actions restricted (e.g., setting other usersâ€™ profiles, global deletes/reads).
Improve the ProfileSetup UX to clearly display backend errors when saving the profile fails (e.g., unauthorized/trap), and ensure the Continue button returns to an actionable state after a failure.
